name: Long Vương (Dragon King)
shortLoreBlurb: Vietnamese dragon kings who rule watery realms and grant rain.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Vietnamese dragon kings who rule watery realms and grant rain.
